segments.text: I notice the tension in the air, a mixture of joy and danger in this little kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of the boy teetering on that unstable stool makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn't the woman see what's happening right under her nose?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of anxiety; a slip could lead to a fall and a world of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to pool around her feet, and yet she remains utterly absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Each wave of water spilling over seems to parallel the children’s carefree spirits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent expressions as they plot their cookie heist feel so at odds with the impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how they’ll react if the woman finally realizes the chaos behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight pouring through the window doesn’t match the tension I feel inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s all so ordinary, yet so precarious at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
